item.title: Microcorruption Guide #0 - New Orleans
item.description: µcorruption guide In this post and the next posts, I’ll try to write companion guide for you when you’re solving the µcorruption CTF. You can open µcorruption here. You’ll need to create an account to play. Prerequisite knowledge I assume you, the reader, are already familiar with these subjects: Basic understanding of computer architecture What a CPU is What are CPU instructions What are CPU registers What is RAM What is input-output Basic understanding of debuggers If you are unfamiliar with some of these subjects, don’t worry!
